Grab images. Optionally use `config edit` first to create a config

Command Flags:

  --subreddit-destination , -sd : Where to store the subreddit
    type : path
    default : [. .]
    configpath : subreddits[].destination
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) :
      00) /Users/bbkane/Pictures/grabbit
      01) /Users/bbkane/Pictures/grabbit
      02) /Users/bbkane/Pictures/grabbit
      03) /Users/bbkane/Pictures/grabbit
      04) /Users/bbkane/Pictures/grabbit
      05) /Users/bbkane/Pictures/grabbit
      06) /Users/bbkane/Pictures/grabbit
      07) /Users/bbkane/Pictures/grabbit
      08) /Users/bbkane/Pictures/grabbit
      09) /Users/bbkane/Pictures/grabbit

  --subreddit-limit , -sl : Max number of links to try to download
    type : int
    default : [2 3]
    configpath : subreddits[].limit
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) :
      00) 2
      01) 1
      02) 4
      03) 10
      04) 1
      05) 3
      06) 3
      07) 2
      08) 1
      09) 2

  --subreddit-name , -sn : Subreddit to grab
    type : string
    default : [earthporn wallpapers]
    configpath : subreddits[].name
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) :
      00) architectureporn
      01) churchporn
      02) cityporn
      03) earthporn
      04) futureporn
      05) imaginarycastles
      06) imaginaryinteriors
      07) villageporn
      08) roomporn
      09) wallpapers

  --subreddit-timeframe , -st : Take the top subreddits from this timeframe
    type : string
    choices : [day week month year all]
    default : [week week]
    configpath : subreddits[].timeframe
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) :
      00) week
      01) week
      02) week
      03) week
      04) week
      05) week
      06) week
      07) week
      08) week
      09) week

  --timeout , -t : Timeout for a single download
    type : duration
    default : 30s
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by appdefault) : 30s

Inherited Section Flags:

  --color : Use ANSI colors
    type : string
    choices : [true false auto]
    default : auto
    currentvalue (set by appdefault) : auto

  --config , -c : Config filepath
    type : path
    default : /Users/bbkane/.config/grabbit.yaml
    currentvalue (set by appdefault) : /Users/bbkane/.config/grabbit.yaml

  --help , -h : Print help
    type : string
    choices : [default detailed outline allcommands]
    default : default
    currentvalue (set by passedflag) : detailed

  --log-filename : Log filename
    type : path
    default : /Users/bbkane/.config/grabbit.jsonl
    configpath : lumberjacklogger.filename
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) : /Users/bbkane/.config/grabbit.jsonl

  --log-maxage : Max age before log rotation in days
    type : int
    default : 30
    configpath : lumberjacklogger.maxage
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) : 30

  --log-maxbackups : Num backups for the log
    type : int
    default : 0
    configpath : lumberjacklogger.maxbackups
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) : 0

  --log-maxsize : Max size of log in megabytes
    type : int
    default : 5
    configpath : lumberjacklogger.maxsize
    required : true
    currentvalue (set by config) : 5
